dogecoin.text: @dogecoin @CoinDesk What would happen if the millionaire sold what he owned?

@dogecoin @CoinDesk According to what logic did this currency grow ?? Which direction are you going ??
Is it possible to develop a currency based on the statement of a billionaire ??? When does the bubble end? Have you thought in which direction you are going ??
@dogecoin @CoinDesk The first person to disappear is the person who is talking about his profit now
